modules.description: Detects tempo in beats per minute by analyzing audio samples provided in either Bigarray or nested float array formats. Accepts input from multiple channels and sample rates, processing audio data to compute a real-time BPM estimate. Used in audio processing applications to synchronize visual effects or control playback speed based on detected rhythm.

Provides functions for time-stretching and pitch-shifting audio samples using the SoundTouch algorithm. Operates on raw audio data represented as arrays of 32-bit floating-point samples. Enables real-time audio processing in applications such as music production and speech analysis.

Analyzes audio input to determine real-time beats per minute, supporting multi-channel and variable sample rate data. Processes Bigarray or nested float arrays to extract rhythmic information for dynamic audio applications. Enables synchronization of visual elements or playback adjustments based on detected tempo. Can be used to align animations with music or adjust audio speed to match a target BPM.
